metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

content.query:
customEvents 
| where name startswith "ProcessBatchMessage"
| extend batch = tostring(customDimensions["batch"]), iterator = toint(tostring(customDimensions["iterator"])), wait = toint(tostring(customDimensions["wait"])), machine = tostring(customDimensions["machine"])
| where machine != "DESKTOP-U147R1L"
| where batch == "{BatchId:value}"
| project timestamp, name, batch, iterator, wait, machine, cloud_RoleInstance
| order by iterator, name, machine

customEvents
| extend batch = tostring(customDimensions["batch"]), iterator = toint(tostring(customDimensions["iterator"])), wait = toint(tostring(customDimensions["wait"])), machine = tostring(customDimensions["machine"])
| where batch == "{BatchId:value}"
| summarize TotalVMInstances = dcount(cloud_RoleInstance)
content.title: Total VMs used to process Batch

content.query:
customEvents
| where name == "ProcessBatchMessage"
| extend batch = tostring(customDimensions["batch"]), iterator = toint(tostring(customDimensions["iterator"])), wait = toint(tostring(customDimensions["wait"])), machine = tostring(customDimensions["machine"])
| where batch == "{BatchId:value}"
| summarize RunCount = count(machine) by machine
| where RunCount > 1
content.title: More than one run on a machine

items.name: More than one run on a machine

content.query:
customEvents
| where name == "ProcessBatchMessage"
| extend batch = tostring(customDimensions["batch"]), iterator = toint(tostring(customDimensions["iterator"])), wait = toint(tostring(customDimensions["wait"])), machine = tostring(customDimensions["machine"])
| where batch == "{BatchId:value}"
| join kind=inner (
    customEvents
    | where name == "ProcessBatchMessage"
    | extend batch = tostring(customDimensions["batch"]), iterator = toint(tostring(customDimensions["iterator"])), wait = toint(tostring(customDimensions["wait"])), machine = tostring(customDimensions["machine"])
    | where batch == "{BatchId:value}"
    | summarize RunCount = count(machine) by machine
    | where RunCount > 1
) on machine
| project timestamp, name, batch, iterator, machine
| order by machine
content.title: Machines that process more than one message

items.name: Machines that process more than one message

content.query:
customEvents 
| where name startswith "ProcessBatchMessage"
| extend batch = tostring(customDimensions["batch"]), iterator = toint(tostring(customDimensions["iterator"])), wait = toint(tostring(customDimensions["wait"])), machine = tostring(customDimensions["machine"])
| where machine != "DESKTOP-U147R1L"
| where batch == "{BatchId:value}"
| summarize RunCount = count(iterator) by iterator, machine
| where RunCount != 2
| order by iterator,  machine
content.title: Incomplete Iterations
